title: [Notbuild]为啥没用....
author: 何昌浩
txt_content:
[Notbuild]为啥没用....
客户端版本是1.11.2
NOtbulid是全版本通用的
我deop自己还可以破坏是怎么回事
config配置如下
Notbuildworld:
- world
- world_nether
- world_the_end
- 九重天大陆
Break:
  switch: true
  message: You don't have permission to break.
Place:
  switch: true
  message: You don't have permission to place.
LeavesDecayworld:
- world
- world_nether
- world_the_end
- 九重天大陆
BlockFadeworld:
- world
- world_nether
- world_the_end
- 九重天大陆
求大佬解释解释！~
